name: Postgres Chat Memory
semantic_context: Stores the chat history in Postgres table.
natural_language_description: 这是 Postgres Chat Memory 节点。主要用于: Stores the chat history in Postgres table.

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one

sessionIdType.name: sessionIdType
sessionIdType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Session ID | 默认值: fromInput
available_options: Connected Chat Trigger Node (值: fromInput) - Looks for an input field called 'sessionId' that is coming from a directly connected Chat Trigger
Define below (值: customKey) - Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text

sessionKey.name: sessionKey
sessionKey.description: The key to use to store session ID in the memory
sessionKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key | 作用: The key to use to store session ID in the memory

tableName.name: tableName
tableName.description: The table name to store the chat history in. If table does not exist, it will be created.
tableName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table Name | 作用: The table name to store the chat history in. If table does not exist, it will be created. | 默认值: n8n_chat_histories

contextWindowLength.name: contextWindowLength
contextWindowLength.natural_language_description: 参数名: Context Window Length | 提示: How many past interactions the model receives as context | 默认值: 5
